item.title: Trump urges House Republicans not to mess with Medicaid: Sources
item.description: President Donald Trump on Tuesday morning turned up the heat on the more than a dozen House Republican holdout votes endangering passage of the bill.

item.title: College freshman drowns in Arizona river on vacation with frat brothers
item.description: A freshman at California State University, Fullerton, died in an accidental drowning incident while on vacation over the weekend.
